bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign Combined Designation of e xin 噁心 , malign center/nausea, and ou tu 嘔吐 , vomiting. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 2 Recipe Entry huo xiang zheng qi san 藿香正氣散 , powder with huo xiang to correct the qi: It cures 心腹冷痛，反胃嘔噁 , “Cold pain in the heart and abdomen, turned over stomach with vomiting and nausea”.
